_comment: This file is JSON (no native comments). Explanations are stored in _comment* fields.
_comment_credentials: Set these to your real Compass credentials (do not commit secrets).
_comment_delay_seconds: Default UI delay/timeout used by some flows (seconds).

logging._comment: Two-Vector logging = (min criticality floor) AND (max verbosity ceiling).
logging._comment_min_crit: Minimum criticality to emit. Typical: INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL. Records below this are dropped.
logging._comment_max_verb: Maximum verbosity to emit: MIN (surface), MED (structure), FULL (atomic). Records above this are dropped.
logging._comment_file: Log file path. The Two-Vector logger writes both to console and this file.
logging._comment_legacy: Legacy keys like logging.level/logging.format are no longer used by the Two-Vector logger and have been removed to avoid confusion.
